name: VR Roller Coaster at Global Wonders
name_original: VR Roller Coaster at Global Wonders
description:
This is a casual and entertaining game. Players wearing a helmet will experience the joy and excitement of riding a roller coaster, as well as browse the scenery along the way. Players can control the speed of the roller coaster, slow down and enjoy the scenery, or drive to a high speed to experience the excitement of the roller coaster. You want speed and passion, or rich beauty, all under your control.

Instructions:
The left handle can interact with UI, the menu button calls out the menu, and the trigger button confirms;
The touchpad on the right handle controls acceleration and down controls deceleration.
